pages.text: A number of buiding block types are added for pure ornamental purposes. For each type, versions of several materials are provided to fit in different building styles.

pages.title: Lacunar Tiles
pages.text: Lacunar tiles are blocks with depressed, stepped surfaces typically used to tile ceilings. Stone, quartz, calcite and felsic tuff versions are provided.

pages.title: Spoked Fences
pages.text: Spoked fences are similar to walls, but partially hollowed. Stone, quartz, calcite and felsic tuff versions are provided.
